verses.name: John 15:5
verses.text: I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.

verses.name: John 15:6
verses.text: If a man abide not in me, he is cast forth as a branch, and is withered; and men gather them, and cast them into the fire, and they are burned.

verses.name: John 15:7
verses.text: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.
